lead_paragraph: If you have lost a golf ball recently - in other words, if you have played golf recently - it might make you feel better to know that there is an army of thousands looking for it. Finding and reselling lost golf balls at roughly a 50 percent discount is a $200-million-a-year industry, golf retail associations estimate.

headline.main: Oh Where Oh Where Has My Little Ball Gone?

abstract: If you have lost a golf ball recently - in other words, if you have played golf recently - it might make you feel better to know that there is an army of thousands looking for it. Finding and reselling lost golf balls at roughly a 50 percent discount is a $200-million-a-year industry, golf retail associations estimate.
